entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] NavigationManager is no longer resolvable outside Razor pages. #60454
  • Authorization FallbackPolicy is misleading #60452
  • Incorrect Base Offset for Dublin Timezone - Discrepancy Between Server and Local Machine #60450
  • [SignalR] NullReferenceException in SignalR.ClientProxyExtensions.SendAsync #60449
  • NewtonsoftJsonPatchInputFormatter not working for non generic JsonPatchDocument with System.Text.Json #60446

Closed

  • Blazor WASM not loading appsettings.{environment}.json in Azure App Services #25152
  • AuthorizeView not work in blazor .net 8 #60189
  • Hosting bundle do not uninstall old dotnet version #59202

PullRequests

Created

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.2.25117.1 #60451
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Scroll in enhanced navigation behaves same as in client side routing #60296
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-enhanced-navigation
  • Add reconnect UI component to the Blazor template #60376
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview2

Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonB enum column with JsonStringEnumConverter is handled as (casted to) integer during projection #35650
  • CLI: adding migration throws exception on MacOS #35649
  • Can I use `[ConcurrencyCheck]` with Cosmos DB to capture concurrent updates. If not, then how I can detect a concurrent update that failed. #35648
  • Inline computed properties #35647
  • EF Core Json Column Update Fails When Updating Date-Related Fields in Owned Navigation Property #35646
    10.0.0

Closed

  • The property or navigation cannot be added to the Entity #35629
  • Chained projection with nullable navigation and collection - InvalidOperationException - LINQ expression could not be translated #35640

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Load an image from a stream in Image class for .NET 9 #27856
  • [Android] - Cookies not modified correctly during navigation #27854
  • Unable to set alternate app (Dynamic Icon Changes) icons in Maui Android!! #27853
  • WebAuthenicator Prevents Dialogs From Displaying #27852
  • .net 9 Android ignoring Android primary color #27850
  • OpenUrl AppDelegate not being called #27849
  • [iOS] [Shell] The 'More' tab doesn't respect shell's nav bar customization #27846
  • CollectionView on Tabbed Page crashes on Android #27844
  • CarouselView Items Alignment Not Proper on Windows Platform #27843
  • Android: Native View not set exception on modal page #27841
  • [iOS] App Crash on Startup when Interpreter is used with Release configuration. #27840
  • Images are not displayed in release with AndroidEnableMarshalMethods=true #27838
  • WebView every time take camera and microphone permission. #27836
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid SDK 9.0.2 template broken for VSCode Macos #27833

Closed

  • [iOS] Application crashes when ToolbarItem is created with invalid IconImageSource name #27095
    Backlog
  • iOS MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync closes the wrong modal #27513
  • [iOS] CollectionView with header or footer has incorrect height #27808
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] CollectionView's height does not include measured height of Header and Footer to size of Content #23435
    Backlog
  • Problems with PrivacyInfo.xcprivacy #27817
  • fontsize tabbedPage not working #27606
  • [Windows] FilePicker.PickAsync exception on Windows Machine #27552
  • CrossConnectivity.Current.IsRemoteReachable in MAUI #27623

PullRequests

Created

    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview2

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0059 incorrectly triggers when assigning to the indexer of a value type #77258
  • MSBuildWorkspace analyzer results are different in .NET 9.0.200 SDK compared to 9.0.103 and manual compilation #77255
  • Inconsistent behavior of attribute target specifiers on events #77254
  • Allow to change the behavior for interfaces for rule IDE0040: Accessibility modifiers required #77253

Closed

  • Virtual static interface methods analyzis API #77257
  • PlatformCompatibilityAnalyzer should report a warning for `UnsupportedOSPlatform` attribute in interface implementation #77256
  • Make `InterceptableLocation` implement `IEquatable<InterceptableLocation>` #77135

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing word the documentation file #77259
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow more of Razor to use Roslyn Lsp types #74597
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Partial events and constructors: doc comments #77200
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Make `InterceptableLocation` implement `IEquatable<InterceptableLocation>` #77137
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review, Next

Updated

  • Partial events and constructors: public API #77202
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Partial events and constructors: attributes #77182
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Emit extension implementation methods #77197
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Extensions: Bind invocations and member accesses #77172
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone Not Obeying disableDaylightSavingTime Parameter #112641
    Future
  • .NET 9 crashes on Windows arm64 with attached profiler and tiered compilation. #112636
  • Repo build using checked runtime fails with JIT asserts #112635
  • Inject HttpClient get Error: Method not found: SocketsHttpHandler.get_MeterFactory() #112634
  • [android] Android.Device_Emulator.JIT.Test failing on emulators with CoreCLR #112633
    10.0.0
  • [browser][ST] mono_thread_interruption_checkpoint #112631
    10.0.0
  • NullReferenceException from MetaDataGetDispenser #112623
    10.0.0
  • ### **Title:** Missing `KeySize` Reading Access in `RSACertificateExtensions.GetRSAPrivateKey` on Linux (.NET 9) #112622
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceEventSourceBridgeTests.TestEnableAllActivitySourcesAllEvents #112621
    Future
  • Test failure: readytorun/GenericCycleDetection/Depth3Test/Depth3Test.cmd #112620
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/explicit/basic/refloc_i4_r/refloc_i4_r.cmd #112619
  • Test failure: Loader/CollectibleAssemblies/ResolvedFromDifferentContext/ResolvedFromDifferentContext/ResolvedFromDifferentContext.cmd #112618

Closed

  • Document AzDO YAML template structure #754
  • [Wasm] Tests flagged with ActiveIssues #40265
  • Blazor issue after SDK 9.0.200 upgrade #112568
  • Strange behaviour after migrating MonoAndroid/Xamarin.iOS project to .net-android/.net-ios #108292
  • [mono] Possible fragile code in /src/mono/browser/runtime/globalization-locale.ts #112573
  • SPMI replays missing on arm32 for `CORINFO_OBJECT_HANDLE` JIT-EE APIs #104329
    10.0.0
  • ijwhost.dll fails to load the .net8.0 runtime in Powershell 7.5 on Windows when using C++/Cli #112402

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix new EH hang on DebugBreak #112640
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • JIT: Clean up and optimize call arg lowering #112639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use encode callback instead of renting a buffer to write to in DSAKeyFormatHelper #112638
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • [browser][ST] avoid thread interruption checkpoint #112637
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Optimize shift operations for BigInteger #112632
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: Unify struct arg morphing #112612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable `SA1015`: Closing generic bracket should not be followed by a space #112597
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Clean up normalizeLocale for mono browser target #112575
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • SPMI: Ensure proper zero extension for `isObjectImmutable` and friends #112617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Quote --version-script path to enable NativeAOT for project with spaces in name #112603
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set AppContext.BaseDirectory and the lookup path for AssemblyDirectory to the directory containing the NativeAOT module #112457
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [TESTING ONLY] Add another set of debugging prints for stack overflow issue #112284
    NO-MERGE, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Generate calls to interface methods through resolve helper #112406
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Experiment] Clone blocks with bounds checks #112595
  • [browser] samplepoint instrumentation into Mono profiler #112352
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] build paltests #112404
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Tensor primitives divide int32 #111505
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http
  • CoreCLR interpreter basic compilation and execution #112369
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Remove RawArrayData #110902
    area-VM-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, needs-area-label
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand `Span<T>` capture #112543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #111666
    Servicing-consider, area-Build-mono, 8.0.x
  • [main] Fix LoaderAllocator computation for a generic type instance #111706
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a unified cache for SSL_CTX objects #112567
    area-System.Net.Security
  • arm64: Change EQ/NE node to SETCC if the operand supports the zero flag #112235
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix path to `dotnet.sh` in `AndroidSampleApp` project #112590
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Clean up and optimize `StackLevelSetter` #112561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow publishing AndroidSampleApp with R2R using in-build crossgen2 #112547
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConvertor` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Remove unused stack probing methods #112347
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [System.DirectoryServices.Protocols] Fix ProtocolVersion Overflow on Big Endian Systems #112391
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix execution of delegate invoke wrapper with interpreter #111700
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.3
  • Implement ExportPkcs12 #112569
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 9.0.200 sdk has lots of dependencies on the 4.13.0.0 compiler which has not been released #46892
  • Rework global.json behavior #46890
  • forceConsistentCasingInFileNames TypeScrypt equivalent for dotnet #46888
  • [NETSDKE2E][Workload set][Mac]With 9.0.201 SDK pkg installed, "Workload update failed: Workload version 9.0.101, which was specified in ..., was not found." happens after running "sudo dotnet workload update --version 9.0.101" #46885

Closed

  • dotnet sln add command inconsistent behaviour in .NET SDK 9.0.2xx #46891
  • `dotnet workload install maui` failed when windows 11 date format and calendar are set to Hebrew #46727
  • A date in the Hebrew calendar leads to an error when log file is created #37932
  • [NETE2ESDK] [Azure Linux Arm64] Error NU1102 is displayed when running dotnet restore with .NET 10 console app #45924

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor clean-up in redist-installer #46896
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid downloading unrelated arcade packages in DownloadPackages.csproj #46895
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Don't set explicit version for Microsoft.Build.NoTargets in project file #46894
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix utility HaveStdErrContainingOnce #46893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Support --framework, --os and --runtime in dotnet test #46861
    Area-dotnet test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #46867
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #46870
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Skip Reason for Tests Requiring New Parser Feature (Refs #46822) #46824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Unescape slnf original solution path #46833
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Update code owners for R2R related code #46858
  • Add ExcludeFromCodeCoverage to template for MSTest, NUnit, XUnit #46866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Write import map to html files #46233
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2644498 #46803
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #46869
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
